title: About Us
text: THIS IS A DEMO E-COMMERCE STORE WHERE YOU CAN BROWSE PRODUCTS BASED ON CATEGORIES. EACH CATEGORY CONSISTS OF SOME PRODUCTS. YOU CAN ORDER THE PRODUCT AND COMPLETE THE PURCHASE BY PAYING THROUGH RAZOR PAY. WE HAVE IMPLEMENTED RAZOR PAY IN DEMO MODE. YOU CAN ACCESS THE ADMIN WEBSITE IF YOU WANT TO ADD NEW PRODUCTS AND IMAGES TO THE WEBSITE OR EDIT ANY PRODUCT. YOU CAN POST BLOGS IN THIS WEBSITE. CREATE REVIEWS.
